theorem wlsAbs_fresh_cases: assumes "wlsAbs (xs,s) A" and "wlsPar P" and "\<And> x X. \<lbrakk>wls s X; \<And> ys. x \<notin> varsOfS P ys; \<And> s' Y. Y \<in> termsOfS P s' \<Longrightarrow> fresh xs x Y; \<And> us s' B. B \<in> absOfS P (us,s') \<Longrightarrow> freshAbs xs x B; \<And> rho. rho \<in> envsOfS P \<Longrightarrow> freshEnv xs x rho\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> phi (xs,s) (Abs xs x X) P" shows "phi (xs,s) A P"
